name: Skeleskeleskelter
description:
A demon girl? (Are those horns a fashion accessory?)… a girl, has lost her jacket.

Please help her find it. 

Well, actually you're more of a third party. 

We can't tell if you're in the game and they just ignore you for the duration of it or if you don't exist in it. 

**contains swearing and descriptions of violence**
